results.content: I actually used this course with learning AWS. I moved on from the Unicorn/Mina setup in the course to a Passenger/Capistrano setup but this course helped a great deal with understanding Ubuntu & Nginx. Of course, I used many other tutorials and blog posts to fill in the gaps for my purposes, but this course is solid to help in understanding how to get an instance set up properly. Great job Saroar and thank you.
